data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 24066, Version Hash: c5ec32b550a15ac92803099df5e67561022d6dc8
data.actual_result: When you click on the client, instead of continuing with the upload the client crashes.
data.expected_result: The client should not crash, and I should be able to upload the image normally.
data.short_description: Following certain steps when uploading an image sometimes causes a client crash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click upload image. - Drag the image you want from 'Open' into the discord client (to prompt upload). - Click cancel on the 'Open' window. - Click back on the main client and it stops responding.
